DOC.brief_title: Effects Complementary Therapies Delivered Via Mobile Technologies
DOC.detailed_description: Patients schedule same-day surgery ( SDS ) often experience state anxiety , may result increased perception pain low self-efficacy healing . Complementary therapy ( CT ) , relaxation technique , massage , guide imagery , acupuncture show benefit patient undergo surgery . The aim study examine effect audio relaxation technique ( ART ) , music intervention ( MI ) , nature video application music ( NVAM ) , nature video application without music ( NVA ) deliver via mobile technology patient ' state anxiety , pain perception , perceive self-efficacy healing . Methods A randomize control trial ( RCT ) involve 105 SDS patient , assign ART ( n = 25 ) , MI ( n = 25 ) , NVAM ( n = 15 ) , NVA ( n = 16 ) , control group ( n = 24 ) assess state anxiety via State Trait Anxiety Inventory ( STAI ) , self-reported pain use numeric rating scale ( NRS ) , self-efficacy general self-efficacy scale ( GSE ) four day prior surgery , immediately prior follow surgical intervention , day five post-operative .
